contextId.information: The people of Jerusalem have not obeyed what God has had His prophets teach to them. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: She has not listened to the voice of God

contextId.information: This is another way of saying that God will cause his people to speak what is right. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_metonymy]])
contextId.quote: I will give pure lips to the people
